data.title: Diana Liow on LinkedIn: Maxis announces major acquisition, expands Managed Network Services…
data.text:
Committed to playing a key role in supporting the digital ambitions of the nation, Maxis has formed one of the largest 5G alliances in Malaysia to accelerate technology breakthroughs and IoT enterprise solutions. Comprising of global and local technology and industry partners, innovators and lighthouse customers from diverse industries, the Alliance aims to co-create, commercialize and scale 5G use cases and innovative solutions across fields to drive digital transformation and innovation. For more information about Maxis 5G Alliance and to become a member, visit https://lnkd.in/e49CY3uj.

Thanks to the Women at Maxis community, we celebrated International Women’s Day last month with a bang! With a lineup of events carefully curated by the team, each one aimed to encourage our women to have open conversations about a range of topics and inspire them to get ahead in their careers and beyond. The celebration kicked off with a fun virtual trivia game centred around women, followed by 3 virtual “Coffee Chat” sessions discussing different insightful topics such as managing career and personal life and taking charge of your career. We also had guest speakers from Microsoft and Grab joining us to discuss about women leadership in the tech space. We hope that we can inspire the women at Maxis to continue to learn and grow as much as they have inspired us to provide equal opportunities for everyone at Maxis to get ahead in their career journey. #lifeatmaxis #IWD2022 #breakthebias

Let us show you how easy it is to safeguard your organisation's Office 365 and endpoint data with Maxis Backup as a Service. We're hosting a dozen live demos all next week to give you the opportunity to see it in action and have all your questions answered. Sign up now: https://lnkd.in/g-GMe8f

Maxis’s partnership with #Microsoft allows the company to build on Microsoft’s solutions and amplify their impact for its business needs, and those of their customers. Microsoft’s comprehensive range of solutions affords #Maxis a broad scope for collaboration which is key to their ambition to be the leading converged solutions provider in Malaysia. Read the full feature at https://aka.ms/AA96et3 #MSPartner Aswin C. Anne Malithi Fernando Asharudin Abdul Buhari Ahsim Nisar Daphne Chan Dashika Gnaneswaran Casandra Seng Eric L. Felicial Tan Jayson Din Swee Key YEO Li Kuan Lai Kathleen Lim KhaiLiang Y. Now more than ever, organizations are counting on holistic and reliable #digital solutions to remain #connected and competitive in today’s environment. We’re proud to be partnering with Maxis, to empower the nation's businesses via three key fronts: Internet of Things, Cloud Computing and Digital Workplace. Together, we are applying the power of Microsoft Azure and Modern Workplace solutions with Maxis’ leadership in #iottechnology and #5gnetwork, to enable digital transformation for all organizations across #Malaysia. https://lnkd.in/gJu2MFW #myempowerednation #bersamamalaysiaku #microsoftazure #modernworkplace #technology Michal Jasmine Sheikh beewah YEO Millie Siew Yi (Eric) Oh Dzahar Khoa Dashika Ellian Nate Vivek Jay Kunal Stefanie Charles Juliana Joshua Raj Mani Jamie Steve Paul Wilson Kim Boey Sally Ansley Keon Casandra Anne Kim Kean
